mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( account, password, email, tel, im, status, gmt_created, gmt_modified ) VALUES ( #{account}, #{password}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{im}, #{status}, #{gmtCreated}, #{gmtModified} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET tel=#{tel}, im=#{im}, gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE account = #{account}
UPDATE user SET password = #{password}, gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE account = #{account}
